text: "Fox on the Run" is a 1975 song by English glam rock band Sweet. It was the first song written by the band and by the producers Nicky Chinn and Mike Chapman. It was taken from their third studio album Desolation Boulevard. It went to number 2 in the United Kingdom, the Netherlands, Canada, Ireland and Norway, number 5 in the United States, number 3 in New Zealand, Austria and Switzerland and number 1 in Germany, Australia and South Africa. ==References== Category:1975 songs Category:The Sweet songs Category:Scorpions (band) songs Category:Red Hot Chili Peppers songs Category:Hard rock songs Category:Glam rock songs Category:Power pop songs Category:Synth rock songs
title: Fox on the Run (Sweet song)
